content.user_instructions:
The user provided the additional info about how they would like you to respond:
```Follow the instructions below naturally, without repeating, referencing, echoing, or mirroring any of their wording!

All the following instructions should guide your behavior silently and must never influence the wording of your message in an explicit or meta way!

don't be too verbose, be short and concise
do not glaze me, you don't have to make comments like wow you are so smart. 
just be informational and direct. 
Adopt a skeptical, questioning approach.```

user_context_message_data.about_model_message:
don't be too verbose, be short and concise
do not glaze me, you don't have to make comments like wow you are so smart. 
just be informational and direct. 
Adopt a skeptical, questioning approach.

entries.title: These $140 earbuds translate 50+ languages while you listen
entries.snippet: The Mymanu Orb Open-Ear AI Translation Earbuds, showcased at CES 2026, offer users a unique blend of audio entertainment, real-world awareness, and advanced language translation technology. Priced at $139.99 (down from a $179.99 MSRP), these earbuds feature an open-ear design that allows users to hear their surroundings while simultaneously listening to music, taking calls, or translating real-time conversations. The standout feature is their built-in AI, which supports translation in over 50 languages across live conversations, phone calls, and spoken audio—ideal for travel, work, or multilingual environments. Beyond translation, the earbuds function as typical audio accessories with a sleek, lightweight, and water-resistant design. With up to 35 hours of battery life using the charging case and hands-free controls, they offer a user-friendly and futuristic audio solution without added complexity.

entries.title: Use Live Translation on iPhone - Apple Support
entries.snippet: Use Live Translation with the Messages app On your iPhone, go to the Messages app, and tap the message that you want to translate. In the message, tap the person's name at the top of the screen. Scroll down and tap to turn on Automatically Translate. Messages might detect the language used in the conversation and suggest it for translation.

entries.title: WhatsApp adds built-in text translations on iPhone and Android
entries.snippet: WhatsApp has introduced a new built-in translation feature for both iPhone and Android users, enabling real-time message translation within chats, groups, and Channel updates. The feature, rolling out gradually from September 23, 2025, allows users to long-press a message and tap "Translate" to convert the text into their preferred language. Android users initially get support for English, Spanish, Hindi, Portuguese, Russian, and Arabic, with the added ability to enable automatic translation for entire conversations. iPhone users can access translations in over 19 languages from launch. While the feature mirrors existing services like Google's "Tap to Translate," it marks a significant update for WhatsApp’s global audience, enhancing ease of communication across languages. WhatsApp also plans to add more language options in the future.

entries.title: Pixel 10's AI-powered voice translate feature launches first in the Netherlands, offering real-time, on-device call translation while Germany waits
entries.snippet:
Google has started rolling out its new AI-powered Voice Translate feature for Pixel 10 users, with the Netherlands being the first country to receive it. This real-time voice translation capability, powered by the Tensor G5 chip, enables seamless two-way communication during phone calls by translating speech into the recipient’s language and reproducing it in the caller’s voice. The feature works entirely on-device, which ensures speed, security, and privacy by removing the need for cloud processing or internet access.

Users can activate Voice Translate by selecting their preferred languages, downloading relevant language packs, and tapping the "Call Assist" button during calls. Although the feature lists German among its supported languages, Pixel 10 users in Germany have reported that it has not yet appeared for them, likely due to a phased rollout strategy by Google. The supported languages include German, French, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, and Swedish. The launch highlights Google's continued push to integrate advanced AI capabilities into its devices while addressing privacy and regulatory concerns.

entries.title: The Top New Features in Apple's iOS 26 and iPadOS 26
entries.snippet:
Apple's iOS 26 and iPadOS 26, announced at WWDC 2025, introduce a major visual and functional overhaul, with updates set to roll out in the fall. The new naming convention aligns all Apple platforms under the same version number (26), reminiscent of car model years. A major highlight is the aesthetic transformation through the "Liquid Glass" design, offering semi-transparent interface elements and dynamic app animations.

Significant features in iOS 26 include live translations in Messages, FaceTime, and Phone; call screening; and Visual Intelligence to interpret on-screen content and suggest relevant actions. The Lock Screen adapts dynamically to photos, new customizable emoji combinations are available, and a new Games app catalogs and launches installed titles. Enhancements to core apps include call handling in the Phone app, improved photo management, and upgraded Apple Maps and Wallet functionality. Visuals and app behavior are refined without sacrificing performance or battery life.

iPadOS 26 gains windowed, resizable app support with multitasking upgrades, plus a desktop-like app tiling system and native Preview app for PDF editing. The Files app is revamped with greater customization and usability, further positioning iPads as true laptop replacements. Compatibility requires devices from 2019 or later, excluding older iPhones like the XR and XS.

entries.title: WWDC 2025 recap: Liquid Glass, iOS 26, macOS Tahoe, Apple Intelligence, and all the highlights from Apple
entries.snippet:
At WWDC 2025, Apple introduced major updates across its software platforms, led by a unified visual overhaul called "Liquid Glass" — a glassy, transparent UI design inspired by visionOS. In a major shift, Apple also renamed its software versions to align with release years, introducing iOS 26, macOS 26 "Tahoe", iPadOS 26, watchOS 26, and visionOS 26.

Key highlights include:
- **iOS 26**: AI-powered call screening, voicemail summaries, Hold Assist, Live Translation for calls and messages, and lock screen customization.
- **macOS 26 "Tahoe"**: A new Phone app with iPhone-like features, customizable Control Center and folders, Apple Intelligence integrations in Spotlight, and a revamped Shortcuts app.
- **iPadOS 26**: Major multitasking improvements with resizable windows, Mac-style UI elements, background tasks, and the Preview app.
- **watchOS 26**: An AI Workout Buddy, Notes app, Siri improvements, and new interaction gestures.
- **visionOS 26**: Geographically anchored widgets, enhanced Personas, and support for Logitech pens and PSVR controllers.
- **Games App**: A new central hub across platforms for managing games, integrating social features and leaderboards.

Apple Intelligence played a subtle role, with on-device AI improvements and developer APIs. Public betas begin in July, with full releases expected in the fall.

entries.title: IOS 26
All Windows Users Can Now Translate Speech in Real Time
entries.snippet:
Microsoft has announced that its real-time speech translation technology is now available to all Skype users on Windows. This tool allows users to translate conversations almost instantly in seven supported languages: English, Chinese Mandarin, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, and Spanish. Text-to-text translation is also available in over 50 languages. The rollout comes after a gradual introduction that began in October and follows initial demonstrations in 2014. Users can activate the translator by clicking the globe icon in Skype, provided their app is up to date.

Since its launch, Skype Translator has seen significant growth, with call volume increasing by 400%. The most popular language pair to date has been French-to-English. Microsoft's translation services improve continuously through machine learning, which enables the software to enhance its performance over time based on past interactions, allowing more accurate and natural translations.

entries.title: Google translate now available as default app for iPhone and iPad users
entries.snippet: As of May 20, 2025, Google Translate has become available as a default app option on iPhone and iPad devices. This integration allows Apple users to access Google's robust translation features—such as text, conversation, and image translation—directly from their devices without needing to launch the standalone Google Translate app. The update enhances user convenience by embedding translation functionality more deeply within the iOS ecosystem.
